name: Classic Lime Paletas (Plus a Little Yogurt)
description: These light, refreshing Lime Yogurt Paletas are the perfect salvation from a hot summer day.

recipeInstructions.text: Juice 8-10 limes. You'll end up with just under 1 cup lime juice
recipeInstructions.name: Juice 8-10 limes. You'll end up with just under 1 cup lime juice

recipeInstructions.text: Combine lime juice with 1 cup yogurt, 1 cup water, and 4 Tablespoons honey in a blender
recipeInstructions.name: Combine lime juice with 1 cup yogurt, 1 cup water, and 4 Tablespoons honey in a blender

recipeInstructions.text: Pour mixture into a popsicle mold or homemade paleta kit and put into the freezer
recipeInstructions.name: Pour mixture into a popsicle mold or homemade paleta kit and put into the freezer

recipeInstructions.text: In an hour, insert popsicle sticks into the mixture
recipeInstructions.name: In an hour, insert popsicle sticks into the mixture

recipeInstructions.text: After 5-6 hours in the freezer they'll be ready to eat
recipeInstructions.name: After 5-6 hours in the freezer they'll be ready to eat

recipeInstructions.text: Run some warm water over the mold
recipeInstructions.name: Run some warm water over the mold

recipeInstructions.text: After letting them rest at room temp for a minute or two you'll be able to slide them out of the mold
recipeInstructions.name: After letting them rest at room temp for a minute or two you'll be able to slide them out of the mold

recipeInstructions.text: Store in the freezer in an airtight freezer bag
recipeInstructions.name: Store in the freezer in an airtight freezer bag
